scripts.build:all: npm run build:mintegral && npm run build:unity
scripts.validate:mintegral: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const filePath=path.join('dist','mintegral','ConceptName.html'); if(!fs.existsSync(filePath)){console.error('File not found:',filePath);process.exit(1);} const file=fs.readFileSync(filePath,'utf8'); console.log('Size:', (Buffer.byteLength(file)/1024/1024).toFixed(2), 'MB'); console.log('Has install event:', file.includes('install')); console.log('All inline:', !file.match(/src=\"http|href=\"http/));"
scripts.validate:unity: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const files=fs.readdirSync('dist').filter(f=>f.includes('UNITY')&&f.endsWith('.html')); if(files.length===0){console.error('Unity HTML file not found in dist/');process.exit(1);} const filePath=path.join('dist',files[0]); const file=fs.readFileSync(filePath,'utf8'); console.log('File:',files[0]); console.log('Size:', (Buffer.byteLength(file)/1024/1024).toFixed(2), 'MB');"
